post:
Webhosting UK Com Ltd. (WHUK), a web hosting company in the UK since 2001, offering professional grade VPS hosting services over Dell hardware hosted in Tier IV datacenter facilities.

Here’s a list of professional VPS plans to choose from:

xLite Starter @ £21.00 GBP
  • 1 vCPU Core
  • 60 GB Disk Space - SAS
  • 2 GB RAM
  • Unrestricted Monthly Bandwidth
  • CentOS 6.2 / Ubuntu Operating System
  • Softaculous
  • Full Root SSH Access
  • 2 Dedicated IP’s
  • Free 24x7 Premium Support, Fully Managed
  • 99.95% Uptime Guarantee
Monthly Price: £21.00 GBP
